source_text: My name is Rob and I am the ET Whisperer and that is a clever name myself and Kalina fell into so it was a great synchronicity and the reason that it fits is because throughout the last 7 years I've contacted or channeled over 100 diffrent ET consciousnesses.

I've not done collective consciousnesses as much, but I have tapped into some of those, some Archangels but for some reason the ET thing sticks with me very well and it fits the energy very well so thats where I like to stay in My connection process is a little different than the rest of the channelers.

That seems a little odd to some people but basically what I'm gonna do, I'm gonna breathe for a little bit and then I'm gonna make some very loud Oming sounds and then I'm gonna breathe a little more, and then Aridif will join us.
The Oming sounds are resonant tuning.
You guys can join along if you want.
You guys can breathe all you want.
That Oming gets your Chakra's vibrating, and that's how it helps me connect to Aridif.
So enjoy yourself and remember every question you ask that's personal in nature is a reflection from your own consciousness.
And Aridif will look at your energy, he'll see any energy that it connects to, your higher self, your oversoul, Archangels, whatever.
He'll see it connecting to it and then he will be able to reflect it back from his perception and his connections, so remember to have fun!
Remember to enjoy yourselves and...
I love you guys.
(Oming sounds) (Oming sounds) Greetings to you all this is Aridif.
That is Ａ･Ｒ･Ｉ･Ｄ･Ｉ･Ｆ and this is it spelled.
I know that many of you have queries of your own in this evening, we will begin in one moment.

But first we wish to discuss the co-creation of the magnitude in which you have all placed your own energy, that you have all placed your own excitement and love, time and effort into... ...making come to fruition for all others in your experience, and outside of it, in this evening.

First of all, when all of you understand that many are aware of what is happening in this moment, in this time ...but there are many who have no concept or clue that this event in the way it is happening, is happening or that it is happening at all, in this evening.
But yet those who are around us are still affected by your excitement, by your co-creative collective consciousness.

By your own desires and excitement you build, and this is what we have shared from the beginning of the time that we have come to Rob and all of the time that we have connected to Treb-BOR-yit-Ne and all of humanity.
We've connected to humanity for thousands of years, and different races of humans, or different time periods of humans.
Different geography's than what we are now, but we always have the capacity to teach and to share what it is that we desire to teach and share with all of you.
That is that you create your own reality from thought.
You create your own reality from your conscious mindset.
That in your co-creation with others that you are creating not only the physical structure around you but all things that accompany the concepts of exchanging energy.
Whether you are walking down the street and seeing someone nod and wave, that is a co-creation but it also created from yourself.
This dynamic is difficult for many humans to comprehend "How are we able to create and co-create?"
"Is the one across from me, the one who is being created or is co-creating with me?"
What we would say to this is, it does not matter!
What matters is your own excitement in the moment.
Your own ability to create what you desire in each moment.
You take your energy and place it in many thought formats.
You place it in many thought forms as you go through the day.

You think about the hardships that you've had in your existence, and that, because you are who you are, and because of your history, you should create more of that and that is what your life is and you have settled for it.
But we understand that all of you who are here in attendance are starting to see greater aspects of yourself.

In each moment you see yourself connecting to other people who's excitement matches. You're co-creating experiences with entities who are not aware of conscious mindset or what the word channeling means, but yet you see them liven up, you see their eyes sparkle, you see them come to an excitement in their own capacity to help co-create more excitement.
That is what this evening is about, is excitement.
It is about creation, it is about co-creation.
What we have shared and what we will always share is that we have a part in sharing our love with you.
You may do with it as you desire, you may take the love that we send you and use it for your own manifestations of excitements, your own co-creations or you may leave it at the door.
We do not mind what you do with the love we give you, we just wish to send you this love.

And this is why we express in all time periods that above all things that have been spoken of in this evening by ourselves is that you are loved is the most important point When you say the words that you are loved, it brings you an experience that feels different than when someone expresses that I love you.

When I love you, this means that two separate entities that are segregated from one another share love and send it to another person who than accepts it but... ...when you are loved, then that is all that needs to be said.
Love is around you.
If you desire it, you can accept it and manifest with it.
Love is what creation is.
It is what all consciousness is made from.
And you as a non-physical entity are aligned with that energy if you desire.
To realign with yourself, all you must do is open yourself for the experience.
Now a part of that experience is understanding things upon a deeper level.

So what we can share with you in this evening is perhaps give you a reflection on the questions you desire in order to co-create a better understanding for you to open your own energy up to the more love around you if you desire.
And if you do not we are still here to share it.
You may begin with your queries at your leisure.
Ever wondered if their is intelligent life elsewhere in the universe?
Well, I have, I've been wondering since I was a kid.
My name is Reuben Langdon.
And on March 29th, 2007, in the middle of the day, I saw a number of strange objects in the sky.
Coincidentally, I was working on the film Avatar at the time, playing an alien.
And ever since then I've been on a quest...
To find out if aliens really do exist and if so... ...are they here with us?
If beings of higher intelligence are here... ...what is their purpose?
Why don't they make themselves more known?
Why the secrecy?
I've asked these questions to many experts, Yet, each seems to have a different theory.
So I thought to myself, why not ask the aliens directly?
So that's what I've set out to do!
Well, sort of...
All right.
Well, here we are.
We're with Rob Gauthier.
And you channel a couple of amazing beings.
More than a couple, I should say.
How about you tell us about yourself and how did you get into this whole channeling process?
Well, it's a bit of a story.
I always love explaining it.
But first, I was a kid growing up in a family that was really Christian.
And Christianity was a big, big part of my life as a child, growing up into a younger teenager.
At about 13, which is the natural time of rebellion for most, I kind of went through this experience where I separated myself from it.
Growing up, I had all these questions.

And every time I would ask the preacher or a person esteemed on the board of the church directors, or whoever, just someone who is knowledgeable, they never could really give an answer that was complete to me.
It always seemed like it just went back to, because the Bible says so, or because the church says so.
And I had a friend who would go with me.
And we were both pretty critical of the whole thing.
So after exploring that, I kind of did my own thing.
I let science be a big part of what my reality was at that point.
In school, I did pretty well with science.
I enjoyed it.
Earth science, especially.
And going through that time period, I distanced myself more and more from the church.
After a few years, I just quit going.
And not to my mother's liking either.
But we just kept going through.
And after a few years of just being off and about, I started going through a real, real rebellious stage.
And that was a very disconnected time in my life.
I hung out with a lot of people who-- they did the gang things in the '90s.
So violence was part of that.
Drugs.
All of those things were a big part.
I started smoking a lot of pot.
It wasn't an expansive thing.
It was fun.
So it was in my destructive--
It was a party thing.
Yes, it was.
Exactly.
Right.
Not Native American going into the woods and--
No drumming circle.
No drumming circle, calling in the Great Spirit Bear.
No.
But there were a lot of bears there, just the wrong kind.
Right, right.
And it was fun.
And it was violent, destructive.
And it was a big part of my life.
And I went that way until right around the time before I found out my son was going to be on his way.
And I just kind of quit hanging out with people a few months before then.
Maybe it was intuition, looking back.
A big responsibility coming.
Well, it was the first time in my life I looked at an aspect of something that wasn't myself.
Everything was centered around myself.
Even though I had people who I loved and were a part of my life, up until then, it was just me.
And knowing this responsibility-- the moment of change really didn't come till the day he was born.
He was born with a lot of physical problems.
Cerebral palsy.
Did you know that right away, right when he was born?
Not to the extent, no.
They told us that he had problems.
So when he came out, he did not have any breath on his own.
They had to hook him up to machines.
So I knew that there was an issue.
But I didn't know the extent of the issue.
I see.
They basically sent us home and said, here's some medicine.
There's a possibility he might have seizures.
We've seen some brain waves that weren't normal.
So they sent me back.
And I took care of him.
And I didn't really know the extent of how bad it was until he started missing all the physical marks. Like they'll say at six months he's supposed to lift his head, and at three months, to do this.
And he missed all of them.
I see.
When he was about two years old, we took him back to the doctor.
And that's when I really knew.
And that's when the depression in myself really started.
That's when the true disconnection that I'd experienced actually happened.
You were disconnected-- just the whole experience, having a son in this state, it was just hard to cope with?
Yeah.
It's the thought of knowing.
And when they tell me, they don't tell me, hey, your son has a problem.
They're like, he has severe problems.
He'll never walk.
He'll never talk.
He'll probably be like a vegetable.
And that's pretty much how the doctor explained that.
Man.
Doctors.
Yeah, no bedside manner.
I know.
And then I guess, they always say, well, we're trained to tell you the worst in case.
And that's not a good training.
Right.
Well, knowing what we know now and what we thought, it's bad.
So it hit me like a ton of bricks.
Sure.
Sure.
It was something that I made myself try to cope with, but I could not on my own.
Right.
I didn't have any spiritual things in my life.
Before all I could depend on was pot.
And that's what helped take the edge off throughout my whole teens and young 20's.
So from the time I found out that my son's mother was pregnant to the time he was two, I had really pulled away from my old lifestyle.
But now I immersed back in it triplefold.
So it was more disconnection than I ever experienced.
More-- my mind's going crazy all the time.
No mental focus whatsoever.
So I go through that.
And it got real bad into the depths of all sorts of things.
I even got into severe drug use and pain-- I started with pain management for a car crash I got into, and it spiraled downhill to the worst case scenario.
And after that, I spent many years just kind of existing.
If I didn't get medicine, I would be sick.
And my life really did a tilt-a-whirl on me.
Right.
And that was the worst time of my life.
And about seven years into it, maybe less than that, of really bad, bad disconnection depression, I finally started coming out of it.
And I went through a lot of steps to get there.
But the last step included me actually starting to see life again, and starting to see-- and this is when I really honed in on nature, and I honed in on the animals.
Before I had pets, but I never had an animal that was connected to me.
I'd never seen it as an equal, I'd seen it as property.
Those little changes subtly creeped in.
And overnight it was just an amazing difference in perception, an amazing difference in the way I felt.
And that's when my true spiritual journey began.
That's when I really started diving in.
One thing I always believed-- and science could not quench my hunger for the desire of how things started-- chemically, yes.
Engineering of the universe, sure.
But never that god that I knew was there.
Right.
So that was the one thing I took into my beginning of this spiritual journey, god.
And one thing too-- a lot of the times during my whole life, UFOs, ghosts, those two things were really something that my friend and I had talked about all the time.
And there was never an explanation from the church or science for either one.
And the afterlife thing was always something that amazed me.
I'd seen these psychics on TV who said I can talk to spirits in the afterlife.
And I was very, very skeptical, to say the least.
But some of the things they would say would be profound.
And I thought, that's a starting point.
Let's look into that.
I found a church that integrated their desire to look on the other side of death, so that they could bring answers from the other side.
And they believe in God.
And they followed a bit of the Bible too, which was a comfort zone, I guess, for me from my childhood belief.
So I jumped in.
And when I went there, they taught me meditation.
Right off the bat, I got a reading from the person, the deacon, or the pastor, whatever title he had, and it was spot on.
He didn't know me.
No one from the church knew me.
No one had my social media profile.
But yet, they told me things about my son.
And they told me things about relatives that, at first, I had no clue.
But when I went to my dad, who follows genealogy and our family tree. He said: Wow, this person from six generations ago had this and this.
So it was perfect.
So it matched up.
Synchronicity.
And it hit me so hard that he could have that kind of information.
That drew a level of reality to me.
It drew some realness to it.
Well, just to back up.
When you said you started noticing the animals or I guess your perspective on animals had changed, was there a specific event or something that made that happen, or did it just happen?
It was a lot of little things.
For instance, the way my dogs would come to me, instead of just kind of-- they would always come to get petted or something, but they would come and spend time with me.
Little things like that.
I see.
Going out in the woods.
As a younger person, I hunted.
It's Michigan culture.
Yeah.
I was raised here.
Right.
So I hunted all the time.
And the last time I went hunting was right around that time.
I had a deer right in my sights.
I actually fell asleep in the woods.
And I woke up, and this deer is five foot from me.
And I had my gun, unlocked the trigger, put it right on the deer, and I couldn't pull the trigger.
And after that, I never went back out in the woods.
Those types of things.
Very hard, very big.

But a lot of little things that led up to it that really made me understand what that connection was a bit more than just the animal-human perspective that Christianity, and just humans in general, believe in.
I see.
I remember you mentioned before that you had gotten involved with some recordings from the Monroe Institute.
Yes.
I would meditate all the time.
And I kept gaining more experiences.
And I finally just kind of pooped out on it, and it just stopped.
After that, I started looking online.
And that's when I found the Monroe Institute.
I found some binaural stuff.
And then I found Hemi-Sync, which was the biggest and best out there.
It's what was claimed.
Right.
I started the Gateway Experience course, which was a six course-- six part per course, and then six courses of meditation, which increased my meditation ability tremendously.
This is where all of the astral projection states come in.
This is where all of the out of body experiences-- it took my meditation to such a level beyond anything I thought was possible at that point.
I had only used meditation before to try to open myself for communication with spirits, dead humans.
That's all I cared about.
Oh, you did.
OK.
That was my intent in my meditation.
When you were in church, still with the church?
Yes.
OK.
The, the spirits was what their church was involved with.
That was the whole focal point of their church, was to communicate with people who had died to give proof of afterlife.
I see.
And that was important to me.
And I thought that wasn't the only intent for meditation.
Right.

My meditation came because, like drugs helped pull me out of pain and suffering, this new excitement I found whenever I would start to go down and start to feel a little cruddy or start getting back in those low points again, I would use meditation.
And it brought me to a new level of feeling good, and excited, and clear.
And I used it like I used to use drugs, several times a day, as much as I could.
The quantity, the quality was important to me.
So I kept using meditation as a tool to help alleviate all that stress and stuff.
So that coupled with that contact of people who had passed on.
Those were the real focus points of my meditation.
And the Hemi-Sync took me above and beyond that.
And can you describe how it did that?
Or is that something you have to buy the Hemi-Sync and go through?
Is there--
It's a several step process.
So the teachings are just tools to use.
And the vibration sounds, basically, they sync up your hemispheres of the brain.
OK.
Yeah, because binaural beats and Hemi-Sync, it's based on the same concept of different tones in different ears.
Yes.
Exactly.
And some of them, and not Hemi-Sync.
I used other ones.
But Hemi-Sync was the one that gave me technique.
Those teach you techniques.
Right.
They teach you healing, out-of-body, communication with spirit, all of those.
And with those, I was able to jump through.
Now, the experiences themselves were so vast, and different kinds of experiences.
The first day I started, there was a vibration in my body I never felt before.
It made my whole body [BUZZING].
And the chakras were just high vibrational.
And those types of experiences were what hooked me in right away.
Wow.
I was skeptical, to say the least.
So I started with my first one saying, well, we'll see what it does.
And the first one was a hit.
So I just kept going.
Wow.
The experience itself-- normally, I suggest to people, if you do the Hemi-Sync, go through it at your own pace.
But I would suggest no less than six months, no less than a year to go through all six.
For me, I jumped through them in four months.
Wow.
And I thought it was way too quick.
But everything happens for a reason.
Right.
And it worked out well.
So that led you into the channeling state?
Or did you get to talk to spirits, I should say?
I never got real contact with spirits in the way I wanted to.
OK.
But my belief system then was I should be hearing them in my ears, like audioclairancy or something.
And that should be the experience.
But I had gotten pictures or ideas.
And that really never happened in the Gateway Experience.
There were times where I was able--
Gateway is the church, or no?
No, Gateway was the Hemi-Sync.
Oh, OK.
That part really never gave me any kind of spirit contact.
Although, I do know that I was connecting to different energies.
Maybe not aware in the moment, questioning that.
And that was something the church had helped me with before, to stop questioning myself, because that's a big, big part of tapping into your intuition.
Right.
So I go through these.
And I get all sorts of experiences, out-of-body experiences, not controlled.
And I still-- to this day, I can astral project, but I can't tell myself where to go.
I can't say, I want to go down the street and hang out in the bar in spirit form.
I can't do that.
Oh, I see.
But you can shoot out of your body.
Oh, yeah.
And then it just kind of--
Every time I connect in channeling, that's what I'm doing.
And then you just-- it just floats around, and you're just kind of observing whatever appears to you?
Or how does that--
Well, I've had experiences like that.
But most of time, it's like an experience going out into a different environment altogether.
I've experienced other planets.
I've experienced other parts of reality here, different times.
But how I connected to TReb was different.
I had not had an out-of-body that was severely powerful or very, very deep in meaning to me.
And I had a real messed up night that night.
I watched the Hubble Deep space thing for the first time, the 3D one that they had on YouTube.
Oh, yeah.
And it touched my heart, but it kind of made me feel empty, like I can't go out there.
I can't be a part of that.
And it really kind of made me depressed a little.
So I used a meditation.
In the Hemi-Sync, they go through steps 1 through 21.
And I decided one night, well, why don't I just go past 21.
And that was that night of depression.
And that's when I met TReb.
And when I met TReb, it was--
Steps 1 through 21, and what do you mean by going past 21?
Do they have actually steps after 21?
No.
Oh.
They do 1 through 21.
And basically, when you're meditating, you're counting.
It's a self-hypnosis.
That's what meditation is.
It's a self-hypnosis.
And each step that you take, you go deeper in.
So step 1, you're starting to feel less your body, and then it goes on.
So I went past the 21.
And that's the maximum of the Gateway Experience, is the 21st-- They call it the 21 state.
What's at 21?
Can you reveal what's at 21?
Well, 21 state is basically a full-blown conscious integration.
You can connect with your higher self.
You can leave your body.
At that point, you're at the deepest level of consciousness available.
And did you kind of in your own mind then say OK, we're going 22.
Yeah.
And I just-- and it wasn't even a number.
I didn't go 22, 23.
Right.
I just went beyond.
Now, it's time to go beyond.
And I did it in the moment.
Through the veil.
Not deciding before, in the moment, and that's when I connected to TReb, right then.
Wow!
Now when I'm connecting to TReb, this is very surreal.
It's very realistic.
It's just like me and you sitting here talking today.
And that's the first time I'd ever left my body in such a fashion.
Wow.
Before when I left my body, there would be tracers or sound would be gone, or the images were blurry, or vibrating.
It was always different, but never this clear.
I was on a ship.
I know that much now, because I've been back to those ships before.
It was one of the Yit ships, which is TReb's people.
And I was sitting there in a room by myself.
And eventually, through the door comes TReb.
And this, it scared the shit out of me.
It was a horribly menacing being that was-- you're looking up to, 7 and 1/2 foot.
I'm sitting in this chair, and I'm instantly transported sitting in a chair.
I always joke, it's like a futuristic space doctor waiting room, because you're just sitting there.
And there is a sign that has this writing over here to the right.
And it's not written in English.
But after looking at it long enough, I could tell.
And it basically says something to the effect: Just sit here, and someone will be with you soon, type thing.
And I laughed about that.
I still-- I don't know if I made--
You interpreted it.
You interpreted it as sit here.
OK.
And I wait.
And this big gigantic reptilian, blue green, gigantic teeth, huge purple eyes, just comes through.
Now, I'll jump ahead just for a second.
When I come back, I think I am insane.
I think something's wrong with me.
I think the Hemi-Sync gave me a brain aneurysm, or something, because this is not real.
It's a crazy psychedelic experience.
Yeah.
Beyond psychedelic
Beyond anything you could ingest, entheogens, any of that.
Oh, wow.
The silver suit, he even wore a silver robe and gold boots.
And I'm thinking to myself, if I were trying to pull out the cheesiest space futuristic suit, what would it be?
And that's it.
And that's what he was wearing.
Wow.
He comes to me.
And it's this gigantic thing.
And I'm scared.
And I felt my energy tighten up like a ball.
And it was very scary for only a couple of seconds.
And after that, it dissipated.
I felt this huge sense of love.
I was able to relax.
It was almost like-- I'm trying to think-- OK, it was almost like a sedative at the doctor, that just relaxed the body and the mind.
And then he came in.
And he said that he was connected to me, that me and him were connected and supposed to meet.
He told me a lot of things that I think I know about reality aren't necessarily the way, there's a lot more to it.
He explained different levels of consciousness.
He explained different dimensions.
He explained--
All this in this one meeting?
In the first meeting, and the first time I ever talked to him.
Wow.
And he didn't go detailed.
Now, I didn't have the terminology either.
Right.
And the way telepathy works is that when-- they're using your words to try to convey a message.
And you don't necessarily get words per se.
It's just kind of a group thought.
All of this coming to me at once.
And it was so overwhelming and so powerful that it was hard to remember a lot of the things that we talked about the first couple of times.
But the first time, I remember it like it was yesterday.
It was so clear.
And he explains, it's not what you think, all these levels.
And he said, I'm here.
I'm here for you.
If you want to connect to me, I'm here.
And I left.
And now, at this time, when I started the Hemi-Sync, I was full-blast.
I'm three times a day meditation for an hour, an hour 25 each.
Plus using closed-eye technique, where I'm just turning sounds into vibrations and energy, and understanding that.
It's kind of a self-taught technique that I taught myself.
Basically, after learning these meditations I would utilize, I was hooked on meditation.
And in my mind, to miss a day of meditation is like missing breathing oxygen.
But after that, it was so intense and so odd, I skipped meditating for over four days before I reconnected.
After the TReb experience.
Yes.
And after that point, I was hesitant to go back.
And I questioned myself more than I did just about any time in my life.
Even more than the--
Questioning your sanity.
Yes, my sanity, everything.
I had talked to my ex-wife, she was my wife then, about it.
And she said, this meditation is doing something to you probably.
I wouldn't worry too much about it.
You seem lucid.
You seem OK.
So finally I...
And the rest of your life was getting better at this point, because of the meditations?
Oh, yes, yes.
By this time, I had already spent several months with the church, several months after the church meditating.
So my life was really getting smooth again.
And relationships, and your son, and your viewpoint, and all that was getting better?
Yes.
It was getting a lot better at that point.
OK.
So you knew the meditations were working, not in a negative way, but in a positive way.
Sure.
Sure.
And it became so much a part of me.
I hated to miss those four days, but I was just so, so questioning myself, and if I should keep going with this.
And it was a big question mark at that point.
But the question remained.
Can I do this again?
Can I meet this being?
Can I ask him questions?
Because I really didn't get a lot of chance to talk and ask questions.
It was more of him saying, hey, this, this, and this.
Right.
Are your ears open?
Yes, they are open now.
So I go back, and I meditate.
You go through the 21 cycle.
Yes, and I go past them.
Now the 22 cycles.
Yes.
So now you know how to get there through this--
Easily now.
Through this process.
Yes.
And the part of me that was hesitant said, I'm just going to do it.
And I went past.
I reconnected to him two or three times after that, just basic conversations.
Who are you?
And it was just as visceral as the first one?
Yes.
Each time?
Each one just as vividly as the last, just as real, just as strong.
Each time it got a little easier.
But about the fourth or fifth time--
It got easier to get there, or just the whole experience?
On my own sanity, on my questioning myself, it got a little easier.
I see.
I see.
It wasn't so jolting.
Right.
OK.
And it was jolting the first time, the second, third.
I go, and I-- the fourth, fifth time I go, and I ask him, how do I know you're real?
How do I know I'm not going crazy?
How do I know something's not wrong with my mind?
And he said, talk to your friend.
And this is the same friend who I grew up with, the same friend, Scott, a dear friend of mine since we were kids.
Right.
How do I know you're real?
He said, go talk to Scott.
And when you do, don't tell him about me, just talk to him as your friend.
And there should be something in there that will help you.
And I go, OK.
No later than a day, my friend gets a hold of me, and says: Hey, I've got this really cool UFO documentary I've been watching.
It's really amazing.
He sends me the link to it, and I watch it.
And on that documentary, they started talking about channeling.
Now--
So you didn't know about channeling.
Nothing about channeling.

Sure.

Carla Rueckert and the crew.

One sentence.

Just the "Seth."
The "Ra Material" was still out of my scope, off my radar.

Yes.

OK.

Same way.
I'm the same way.
It's a cognitive thing.

Nice.

It's the clip on YouTube?

And this is something I never have said publicly before, but in that four-day period where I stayed away from the meditation and didn't go back to TReb, I actually went to the emergency room and said, I had this experience.

The doctor was cool.

Oh, OK.

It's real.
Gold boots, silver robe.

No, very lightly.

He was cool.
All right.

True.

And I have those experiences.

And if there is, you need to be there.

Yeah.
OK.

It's still like--

OK.

But yeah, I've been everywhere with him.

What is that like?

Boxy.

Vashta does those, and Eduardo.

Do you think then when CGI artists-- I used to run a visual effects company, so I know some of these model makers come out with these fascinating designs-- do you think they're actually tapping into some alternate planetary consciousness out there as opposed to it being originally created, or maybe pieces of different planetary consciousnesses?
I guarantee they're channeling 90% or more of it.
Oh, wow.
They're even-- and it's something like it's a conundrum where is it that everything exists, or is it that this universe is so big, that it has to exist somewhere?
Or is it just whatever you think, you create?
It doesn't really matter, because what they're doing is real.
I've seen some of the special effects stuff that people have done in movies or video games.
And it's like, I've seen something almost exactly like that, or something very similar.
Enough where you couldn't notice the difference to someone who doesn't live there.
Right.
Wow.
So it's truly inspiration.
That imagination part of us is us tapping into that.
Yeah.
Fascinating.
So you spend two years going to this world, having these conversations.
And it's your idea then to finally talk to TReb and say, hey, why don't we try this whole channeling thing?
Yeah.

Of course, I'm sure.

He said, yeah.

Awesome.

How did that work?

And it was never me going, hey, I think this will work.
I went out on the internet.
Obviously, the internet was great.
There wasn't a lot of stuff there.
So I searched out psychic mediums.
I knew a guy who worked with the team of the "Law of One" material, that after the "Law Of One" material was written, he worked closely with the main channeler there, Carla Rueckert.
So I worked with him and talked to him.
And he gave me a lot of really great information.
I had looked up online a couple of channeling books.

Right.
And worked with TReb.
And TReb helped me out with a lot.
And then I just kind of borrowed a little from everything until it was perfect.
And then I found my own mix.
It was a garden variety of a little bit of everything.
What got you through?
What was the catalyst to bring TReb through?
What was your first channeling experience, I guess?
Well, my first channeling experience, I set up a camera.
My then wife was there to kind of monitor me and make sure nothing went too crazy.
That was a concern of mine.
I got this entity coming in my body.
I don't want to lose control or-- you know, the Christian part of my mind...
Hulk out!
You have this big green alien coming through you, you might. Did that ever go through you mind?
A little bit of that.
OK.
At that point, I trusted TReb.
I'd come to love him like a dear friend.
But there's still the unknown.
Why would this entity come and choose me out of everybody?
Why?
My Christian beliefs tapped on my shoulder a few times.
So I wanted to be careful.
I wanted to be good.
I recorded myself, and it was amazingly horrible.
Amazingly horrible.
Yes.
OK.
Can you describe amazingly horrible?
Yes.
The voice that people hear TReb now, even if they go back four years, it's not the same.
It's a little different.
And the accent's the same, the type of talking that he uses.
But the inflections are different.
And the yeses are much more vibrant.
And like when he says, yes-- that "ye-e-e-s", really excited-- that wasn't there then.
It was very flat and monotone, and kind of filtery too.
There was just-- I could tell all of TReb wasn't getting in.
So I practiced a few more times.
But when you get to know me, you know about me, I don't wait for anything.
I don't wait till everything's perfect.
I just jump headfirst, fly by the seat of my pants.
So I immediately went to the YouTube waves.
I want to share this.
And my first channeling was actually a lot better.
In the couple of times I had tried between then, I probably only did maybe 6 to 10 channelings between the first one and the one I put on YouTube.
And when you describe 6 to 10 channelings, or six channelings or so before you-- and you're recording yourself, are you asking questions?
Is it just you in the room?
I mean, how do you-- is there somebody else?
Well, you said your wife-- is she there to help facilitate?
Yes.
At that point, the first couple ones was just letting TReb talk.
I told him, you just come through and say what you want to say.
I'll share something.
If it's usable, we can put it on YouTube.
So address people.
And that's the first couple of times.
And then after that, my then wife would ask a few questions.
I let one of my friends try.
So it was basically trial and error, just playing around the first time.
So I guess the information was still good.
It was just-- you say when it was horrible, it wasn't the information was horrible.
Right.
OK.
And some of the information came through a little odd, just the verbiage on it was weird.
You could tell it was like having someone who first learned how to speak English be able to talk.
Right.
OK.
Well, that's what I was wondering.
And maybe this is a question for TReb later.
Does he have to learn English?
Or is it all translated by you via vibrational translations, vibrational frequencies?
My best understanding is that, basically-- like when I go to channel, I'm using the same techniques in a quicker way than I used to when I would leave my physical body.
So I'm leaving, and part of TReb comes in.
So when he's in, he's mixing his energy with mine.
So it's running through my chakra systems, but also accessing the brain part.
And in that brain part is the whole English language, my experiences, all of my personality.
So he has the opportunity to access that.
So English, it wasn't that the English was bad, because he knew English by knowing my mind.
It was the way of trying to express it.
Like Aridif and TReb, still to this day, sometimes they might get hung up on a word, so they'll stop.
Right.
And they'll search for the word or find one that's as compatible as they can.
So sometimes when-- like the one that's most known, Aridif, when he says, you must do this, he's not saying, you have to do this.
He's saying, if you want what you're desiring, this is the best way.
Right
So little things like that.
But then it was much more disproportional than it is now.
I see.
So it was more of a translation glitch--
Right.
Than an actual understanding of the language or knowing the language.
It's not necessarily what's happening.
It's not like he went and had to take a course in English 101.
That would be rough.
Yeah.
But yeah, absolutely.
It's a translational vibrational thing.
My vibration at the time, it wasn't what it is now.
I was learning all this cool stuff, but I hadn't applied very much of it.
What I did learn and applied helped.
And it was really six months--
In some way, you're translating too.
You have to raise your level.
He has to bring his level down.
So there has to be this kind of-- and then there's a growth, I'm assuming, since then.
Like you said, it's gotten better.
So you're able to meet each other's frequencies.
You're going up there, him coming down here.
So that's evolved over the years.
Yes, absolutely.
That's the perfect way, too, to explain that.
It's something where it's amalgamation of two consciousnesses.
And it's a concerted effort on both of our parts to co-create that.
And I couldn't get up to him.
He could always come down to me, but I just couldn't get up to him.
And the more I channeled, the more I felt his energy.
And the more I felt his energy, the easier it was for me to integrate certain parts of the teachings.
And in the teachings, a lot of the stuff about self-creation, relaxing, the way to perceive reality started clicking easier.
So after the first six months of channeling, I was 10 times better than the first one.
And in the first year of channeling, I was 10 times better than that.
And it kept going.
And it's like any job that any person does with their motor skills.
Muscle memory comes into play.
Well, this is energetic muscle memory.
And that's how it's applied.
It's the more you do and repeat, the better you are at it.
And that's why even to this day, I get better at channeling.
I see.
This time last year, channeling was great.
It was smooth.
People resonated with it, but now it's a whole new level.
And this is why you see the veterans out there who've channeled their entire life; Darryl Anka, and Nora, and Wendy.
All those great channelers, they've been doing that forever.
It's their connection.
TReb and Aridif actually have a term for it.
It's called building a bridge.
And each time you channel, you're putting a new peg in, or a new screw, or a new plate of metal.
And the bigger the piece comes, it's the bigger realizations you have in yourself.
I had points in my channeling where I didn't learn anything.
Whenever I'd listen back to a session, I was like, I already knew that.
But when I started really learning things about my own life on my own terms, then it would shine through on the channeling.
And then it would open up more synchronicities.
And it wasn't that the information wasn't new.
It's just the way I perceived it was old.
So when I changed my perceptions and my energy grew, that allowed that energy to come in a lot better with understandings and synchronicities to apply itself.
So would that make the channeling then better, better, more defined, or in a better-- more terminology?
Or because you were able to have that perspective on it, did you think that helped the channeling?
Absolutely.
And that was another thing.
My English skills have zero.
When I went through school, I sucked at it.
I could speak English.
Just like me.
Yeah.
And it's not something that I was great at.
Right.
But the more I cared about how I talked, because I realized-- and Kalina has been my number one helper in that.
Every time I throw a word that doesn't exist or one that's mispronounced, she helps me with that, because she knows, they need that too to reflect back on.
I see.
But the more energy I opened up, the more clarity came with it, the easier it was for them to find the translation, not only of energy, but words.
Interesting.
So TReb started coming in, and you're checking in.
Are you still going and doing your meditations with him at the same time during this process?
Or is the process of channeling, is it the same as going into the meditations?
Are you trance channeling, I guess, in a sense where -- are you conscious of what's happening during the channel?
Now, it depends.
There are three types of channel states that I do.
All of them are trance channeling.
The first and most common occurrence is just like when I visited TReb.
I'm going to visit him.
I'm there with him astrally.
I perceive him in real-time, just as real as we are.
And that happens the most.
And while I'm channeling down here, not conscious of anything that's being said, I'm hanging out with him.
Going fishing with TReb.
Right.
Right.
And the second level is the same thing.
I'm out of my body.
I'm experiencing something.
But usually, it's something that needs to be seen by me.
And this can be a lot of different things.
TReb showed me time periods.
He showed me different planets, different animals, different vegetation, just all sorts of stuff that at a later time comes in for referencing that I need.
So that happens very seldomly.
When you say, come in for reference, in what sense?
Like the conversation we're having here, and you can reference that stuff?
Yeah.
Like sometimes, people are like, yeah, I met this reptilian being that was so and so.
And so I was like, oh, that's the same one that TReb showed me.
Or I wonder what happened in this timeline.
It gives me a better understanding.
And I don't understand what it is in the moment, but in reflecting later, I always get what's going on.
I see.
So that's the second most common occurrence.
And then the last one is where I'm like in a deep meditative state, where everything's just kind of blacked out, sometimes colors, sometimes things like that.
And I'm able to hear what's going on in the session.
Now, if I channel 100 times, probably 85 to 90 of them are me and TReb hanging out.
All of them, but one of them would be the deep meditation where I'm hearing the session.
And this only occurs when there is something I really need to hear in that moment in the session.
So it very rarely occurs.
Do you ever go in and out, like you're hanging out with him, and all of a sudden you get sucked back into the room?
No, never.
It's always with TReb all the time, or he's showing me something, or then.
And the second most common one where he's showing me something, it's not with him.
It's me separately by myself seeing these things.
So that rarely ever occurs.
Out of 100 times, maybe 14 times I'll be doing that.
So it's not very-- and it's probably less than that, but I'm trying to give a scale for people to understand that.

Now, do you-- since starting the channeling, since having these conversations with TReb, the meditations, have you become more-- instead of just applying these things to your life, have you noticed your own intuitiveness or psychic abilities, or anything else happening in these past few years?
Absolutely.
The integration process.
And this is something that's fairly new to me.
I've been doing channeling in the sense of public channeling since about 2010, late 2010.
And in that time, I was always aware that TReb's energy was around me, but it never went past that.
My life, my intuition was good, but it was no better than where I was when I first started meditating and learning to receive.
In the last year, year and a half-- well, it's probably closer to two years now-- I've actually been more conscious of TReb and Aridif as they come through.
I can hear TReb give me messages while I'm in the wakened state.
I feel more of his consciousness.
My personality even is more the style of TReb, where-- like TReb, he loves everything.
He wants to experience everything.
And I find more of that energy in me.
And there's always been a part of that for me.
I've always enjoyed enjoying things, but to a different extent.
I could feel that combining with TReb's energy.
So it's like an amalgamation.
And this goes with psychic ability.
It goes with everything.
There's times where I grab something and walk it over to Kalina.
And she's like, I was just going to ask you for that.
Or things simple like that, like picking a movie that she had wanted to watch, or a song that she was dying to hear.
So those things.
And that shows a great deal about both of our connection too as well.
But meeting Kalina was probably one of the energetic shifting points on a lot of things.
When I met Kalina, it's just the energy shifted so much.
I finally found a partner who was on the same journey that I was.
The same excitements.
She met me through the work I was doing.
She was helping me edit videos and stuff as we developed a friendship for a couple of years.
And then as my divorce happened with my ex-wife, then me and her got together.
And we started a relationship.
And her excitements and my excitements, because they're on the same level, we reflect that.
So our psychic ability helps.
The efforts of the work has helped.
I was just-- when I first started channeling, I was doing it for fun.
I was doing it for the benefit of other people, which I still am.
But I had a daytime job.
I worked that job 10 hours a day.
I was going to say, how in the world could you meditate for as long as you did for the first two years, and still maintain a job, and have a son?
And that's crazy.
Did you sleep?
Well, the first hour and 25 minutes, that was pretty easy.
The first one in the morning before all the kids.
Because I used to babysit, so I was at home.
Oh, wow.
I could work from home.
And when these four to six kids would come over, I would be able to meditate before they got there, and then once at lunch time when I put them all for a nap, and once after Jeremy.
He would get home from school after the kids would leave.
And then I would be able to put him to bed, and then do it.
So you figured it out somehow.
I did.
You managed to get those several-- two to four hours a day?
Well, three of the meditations were an hour to an hour and 25.
My closed-eye technique didn't require me to be anywhere.
I could still be present with you.
Like right now, I'm closing my eyes.
I can hear you.
I can hear Kalina, so I'm OK.
And if I didn't need my eyes, I could literally up to six to eight hours a day do the closed-eye technique.
Whenever I didn't need my eyes, they were shut all the time.
I was dedicated.
I was like--
Wow.
That's awesome.
Yeah.
I was like--
I'm taking notes.
An addict for meditation.
Yeah.
It was.
I was addicted to it.
Do you still meditate then?
The only meditation I need now is when I connect to TReb.
I do it so frequently, that that is my meditation now.
I was going to say-- because it sounds like a meditation.
You're going to this deep-- you're going to another planet.
Jeez.
That's awesome.
